briefTitle: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Vehicle-Controlled Study in Subjects With Seborrheic Keratosis
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Vehicle-Controlled, PArallel Group Study of the Safety and Effectiveness of A-101 Solution 40% in Subjects With Seborrheic Keratosis on the Trunk, Extremities and Face.
summary: This is a randomized, double-blind, vehicle-controlled, parallel group study.

primaryOutcome.measure: Proportion of Subjects With All Target Lesions Cleared According to Physician Lesion Assessment Scale
